caption.title: Cross-detection assays to confirm the specificity of the RT-LAMP protocols to detect DENV RNA (black line).
caption.p: There was no amplification of other flaviviruses RNA (discontinuous grey lines) or in the NTC (continuous grey line). (A), (C), (E) and (G) show the amplification profiles for the RT-LAMP reaction. (B), (D), (F) and (H) show the annealing curve for specificity.
